comments: Exchanges an OAuth authorization code for an access token.
Makes a request to the Token endpoint to exchange the authorization code returned from the Authorize endpoint for an access token.

params.name: code
comments: The authorization code returned on the /oauth2/authorize response.

params.name: client_id
comments: (Optional) The unique client identifier. The client Id is the Id of the FusionAuth Application in which you are attempting to authenticate.
This parameter is optional when Basic Authorization is used to authenticate this request.

params.name: client_secret
comments: (Optional) The client secret. This value will be required if client authentication is enabled.

params.name: grant_type
comments: The grant type to be used. This value must be set to authorization_code

params.name: redirect_uri
comments: The URI to redirect to upon a successful request.

params.name: tenantId
comments: (Optional) The Id of the tenant to use for this request.
